import React,{ useState, useEffect } from "react"; import LinePlot from "../charts/LinePlot" import BarPlot from "../charts/BarPlot" import Navbar from "../Navbar"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import Sidebar from "../Sidebar.js"; import { db } from "../../firebase" import { collection,onSnapshot, query, orderBy } from "firebase/firestore"; import { BsArrowDownShort, BsArrowUpShort } from "react-icons/bs"; import { FaChartBar } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AiFillPieChart, AiOutlinePercentage } from "react-icons/ai"; export default function Dashboard() { const [ purchases, setPurchases ] = useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ const q = query(collection(db,"purchases"),orderBy("timestamp","desc")) onSnapshot(q,(snapshot) =>{ setPurchases(snapshot.docs.map((doc) => ({ ...doc.data(), id: doc.id}))); }); },[]); const purchases_data = purchases.filter(purchase=> purchase.paid === "Cash"); let sum = 0; const cashPrice = [] for(let i = 0; i < purchases_data.length; i++){ sum = sum + parseInt(purchases_data[i].price); } cashPrice.push({price:sum}); const creditData = purchases.filter(purchase=> purchase.paid === "Credit"); let creditSum = 0; const creditPrice = [] for(let i = 0; i < creditData.length; i++){ creditSum = creditSum + parseInt(creditData[i].price); } creditPrice.push({price:creditSum}); return ( <>
{/* Header */}
{/* Card stats */}
revenue
{cashPrice.map(item =>( { new Intl.NumberFormat().format(item.price)} Tsh ))}

3.48% Since last month

creditor
{creditPrice.map(item =>( { new Intl.NumberFormat().format(item.price) } ))}

3.48% Since last week

purchases
{cashPrice.map(item =>( { new Intl.NumberFormat().format(item.price) } Tsh ))}

1.10% Since yesterday

debtors
{creditPrice.map(item =>( { new Intl.NumberFormat().format(item.price) } ))}

12% Since last month

{/*End Card stats */}
); }
